nodes.text: Chiss commandos were a special forces unit employed within the Chiss Ascendancy. They seen action during the Battle of Tenupe the final battle of Swarm War. Chiss commandos wore camouflaged color-shifting, fractal-pattern armor that allowed them to sneak across battlefields with ease, and carried demolition satchels and charric guns. They were deployed on specialist tasks such as the placement of vape charges on selected locations.
